gadgets-required-actions: Works on the {{PLURAL:$2|'$1' page action|following page actions: $1}}.
gadgets-export-text:
To export the $1 gadget, click on '{{int:gadgets-export-download}}' button, save the downloaded file, go to Special:Import on destination wiki and upload it. Then add the following to MediaWiki:Gadgets-definition page: 
$2
You must have appropriate permissions on destination wiki (including the right to edit system messages) and import from file uploads must be enabled.
